channel.title: Having troble staring a offline private server
channel.description:
I just download richscape and want to be able to play with brother with a lan connection but when ever i try to build the server or compile the client it does this:
Buliding the server Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Press any key to continue . . .
compiling the client Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. done!
Then i try to run the client Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: EGUI at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: EGUI. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Having troble staring a offline private server
item.dc:creator: @scopene scopene
item.description:
@scopene wrote:

well i have no idea on how 2 fix that do u?
or do u have a working private server could use or something?

Read full topic

@Gflo wrote:

I’m a bit rusty on my java but it looks as though EGUI is not defined in your main.java(or Java.lang) class

I just download richscape and want to be able to play with brother with a lan connection but when ever i try to build the server or compile the client it does this:

Buliding the server
Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Press any key to continue . . .

done!

Then i try to run the client
